title: Bug 124777: Setting blank tooltip in chart title causes exception during preview
SR:
Bug 124777: Setting blank tooltip in chart title causes exception during preview.

Description: When setting a blank tooltip in the chart title, an exception occurs during preview.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new simple chart.
2. Add interactivity to the title: Mouse over and show tooltip.
3. Keep the tooltip text blank and click the 'Add' button.
